error.invalid_path: Path must be a relative path, not absolute
error.invalid_child_locks_file: Problem with child locks file, refer to logs for more information

user.description:
Select the lock to setup and code slots to create.

Paths are relative to your Home Assistant config folder (e.g. `/config/packages/keymaster` should be entered as `packages/keymaster`)

If you are using Z-Wave JS you may or may not have alarm level and alarm type entities. If you do, select them on this form, otherwise you can use the `sensor.fake` values as placeholders.
user.title: KeyMaster

data.generate_package: Generate package after you press submit?

config_2.description:
If checked this will generate the files once you click submit.
WARNING: This will remove any customization you've done to the yaml files.
config_2.title: Confirm

init.description:
Select the lock to setup and code slots to create.

Paths are relative to your Home Assistant config folder (e.g. `/config/packages/keymaster` should be entered as `packages/keymaster`)

If you are using Z-Wave JS you may or may not have alarm level and alarm type entities. If you do, select them on this form, otherwise you can use the `sensor.fake` values as placeholders.
init.title: KeyMaster
